title: Dusseldorf Refined Retreat with Rhine River Views
description: A refined urban retreat boasting Rhine River views, Crowne Plaza Dusseldorf - Neuss, an IHG Hotel, is only minutes from Dusseldorf and Neuss. Savour delightful dishes alongside enchanting views of the Rhine at the Riverside restaurant or lunge into your workout at the onsite fitness centre. As evening approaches, venture into vibrant Dusseldorf to experience the local nightlife, kick back in the RiverBar with a refined cocktail or return to a sophisticated suite for a pleasant night's sleep.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Dusseldorf - Neuss, an IHG Hotel
